_schema: timestamp (ISO-8601), failure (string), context (string), root_cause (string), impact (string), prevention (string), significance (1-10), tags (array)

context: Attempted to configure /workspace/extra/ mount for container context. container_config in messages.db was empty. Mount failed silently.
root_cause: NanoClaw MCP server initialization didn't create container_config entry. Expected configuration file at separate path didn't exist.
impact: Bridge commands inaccessible from container context for ~2 hours until root cause identified.
prevention: container_config should be initialized with default safe mounts during NanoClaw setup. Validation step should confirm mounts before declaring container ready.

context: After adding container_config, mount still failed. Used ~/magic-bridge in allowlist. Apple Container requires absolute paths.
root_cause: Misunderstood allowlist path requirements. Tilde expansion doesn't happen in container allowlist. Must be /Users/owl/magic-bridge.
impact: Additional 30 minutes debugging. Second attempt also failed before discovering absolute path requirement.
prevention: Documentation should explicitly state: allowlist requires absolute paths, no tilde, no relative paths. Validation should reject non-absolute paths.
